name: MenuCheckboxItem
description:
A menu item that toggles a setting on or off.
Renders a `<div>` element.

checked.description:
Whether the checkbox item is currently ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox item, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

closeOnClick.description: If `true`, the menu will close when the menu item is clicked.

defaultChecked.description:
Whether the checkbox item is initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox item, use the `checked` prop instead.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user actions.

id.description: The id of the menu item.

label.description:
A text representation of the menu item's content.
Used for keyboard text navigation matching.

onCheckedChange.description: Event handler called when the checkbox item is ticked or unticked.

onClick.description: The click handler for the menu item.
